      • printOut

        public void printOut(java.lang.String filePath,
            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> items,
            java.lang.String customer,
            java.lang.String staff,
            double total,
            double tendered,
            double change)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Obtains selected directory path for file export before retrieving all class and relationship data and converting into Java code using string manipulation and concatination. Java code is then saved as '.java' files in user specified directory.
        Parameters:
        filePath - - File path for .java files selected by user using dialog
        items - the items
        customer - the customer
        staff - the staff
        total - the total
        tendered - the tendered
        change - the change
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - IO/FileNotFound exceptions that are thrown and dealt with by uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.panel.CanvasPanel
